metadata.title: CVE-2018-18445 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel 4.14.x, 4.15.x, 4.16.x, 4.17.x, and 4.18.x before4.18.13, faulty computation of numeric bounds in the BPF verifier permitsout-of-bounds memory accesses because adjust_scalar_min_max_vals inkernel/bpf/verifier.c mishandles 32-bit right shifts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18445` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1

No subscription required
